column5: If you’re looking for a group outing that’s budget friendly, head over to Flea Market Road and visit First Monday Trade Days. Immerse yourself in all that Gun Barrel City has to offer at this charming 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom vacation rental cottage that comfortably sleeps 8. Situated on a half acre of land, surrounded by Cedar Creek Lake, this cozy A-framed cottage will provide you and your travel companions with easy access to restaurants, a marina, watercraft rentals and docks, and a state park!
column8: Cozy 3BR Gun Barrel City Cottage on a Lake!
